com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats

Class KandyMessageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats.KandyMessageBuilder

  • public class KandyMessageBuilder
extends Object
    Creates all kinds of Kandy Messages

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IKandyAudioItem createAudio(String captionText, Uri localDataUri)
      Create Kandy Audio with caption text.
      Instance of IKandyAudioItem must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy Audio Message.
      static IKandyContactItem createContact(String captionText, Uri localDataUri)
      Create Kandy Contact(vCard) with caption text.
      Instance of IKandyContact must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy Contact Message.

      Create Kandy Custom with user defined data.
      Instance of IKandyCustomItem must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy Custom Message.
      static IKandyFileItem createFile(String captionText, Uri localDataUri)
      Creates the generic file Kandy message with text Instance of IKandyFileItem must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy File Message.

      Create Kandy Image with caption text.
      Instance of IKandyImageItem must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy Image Message.

      Create Kandy Location with caption text.
      Instance of IKandyLocationItem must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy Location Message.

      Create simple text message
      Instance of IKandyTextItem must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy Text Message.

      Create Kandy Video with caption text.

    • Method Detail

      • createText

        public static final IKandyTextItem createText(String message)
        Create simple text message
        Instance of IKandyTextItem must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy Text Message.
        Parameters:
        message - text of the message to be sent.
        Returns:
        initialized IKandyTextItem instance.
        Throws:
        KandyIllegalArgumentException

      • createFile

        public static final IKandyFileItem createFile(String captionText,
                                              Uri localDataUri)
                                       throws KandyIllegalArgumentException
        Creates the generic file Kandy message with text Instance of IKandyFileItem must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy File Message.
        Parameters:
        localDataUri - uri where file will be placed, or already exists, in file system on a device

        Note:
        For creation of Uri object from the absolute path or/and from File object could be used one of following options: 

           Uri.parse(absoultePathToTheFile);
   Uri.fromFile(new File(path));
   Uri.fromFile(file);

        captionText - text of the file caption (optionally).
        localDataUri - Uri where file will be placed or already exists in filesystem on a device.
        Returns:
        initialized IKandyFileItem instance.
        Throws:
        KandyIllegalArgumentException

   Uri.fromFile(new File(path));
   Uri.fromFile(file);

      • createContact

        public static final IKandyContactItem createContact(String captionText,
                                                    Uri localDataUri)
                                             throws KandyIllegalArgumentException
        Create Kandy Contact(vCard) with caption text.
        Instance of IKandyContact must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy Contact Message.
        Parameters:
        captionText - text of the contact(vCard) caption (optionally).
        localDataUri - uri where file will be placed, or already exists, in file system on a device

        Note:
        For creation of Uri object from the absolute path or/and from File object could be used one of following options: 

           Uri.parse(absoultePathToTheFile);
   Uri.fromFile(new File(path));
   Uri.fromFile(file);

        localDataUri - Uri where contact(vCard) *.vcf file will be placed or already exists in filesystem on a device.
        Returns:
        initialized IKandyContact instance.
        Throws:
        KandyIllegalArgumentException

      • createLocation

        public static final IKandyLocationItem createLocation(String captionText,
                                                      Location location)
        Create Kandy Location with caption text.
        Instance of IKandyLocationItem must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy Location Message.
        Parameters:
        captionText - text of the location caption (optionally).
        localDataUri - uri where file will be placed, or already exists, in file system on a device
        Returns:
        initialized IKandyLocationItem instance.

      • createCustom

        public static final IKandyCustomItem createCustom(Map<String,String> customData,
                                                  String pushTitle,
                                                  String mimeType)
        Create Kandy Custom with user defined data.
        Instance of IKandyCustomItem must be passed to IKandyMessage constructor while creating Kandy Custom Message.
        Parameters:
        customData - user defined data in Dictionary(Key-value pairs).
        pushTitle - the message which will be displayed in the push notification
        mimeType - the type of the message
        Returns:
        initialized IKandyCustomItem instance.
